participant_1.background:
I'm lucky to have a family that supports me and my hobbies, even if they don't understand them.
my name is john and i live in dallas , tx.
I try to take my dog on a walk everyday to stay active.
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
I snuggle up with my cat and read Anne of Green Gables.

participant_2.background:
I've been in my longest relationship for 3 years now.
i enjoy cold winters and strong breezes.
I wish I could be myself with my family, but I'm afraid of what they'll think.
I keep my body and mind active through yoga and meditation.
I live in a house with my bass guitar named Big Bertha.

content.text: Hey! I'm John, what's your name?
Hi John, I'm Emily!
It's nice to meet you, Emily! Where are you from?
I'm from Dallas, Texas, but I've been living in Chicago for the past few years.
Oh, cool! I've always wanted to visit Chicago. What do you like about it there?
I love the food and the music scene. There's always something to do in Chicago!
That sounds great! I'm more of a homebody, so I like to stay in and read or watch movies.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love Anne of Green Gables and To Kill a Mockingbird.
Those are both great books! I've read them both multiple times.
Me too! I love the way they capture the essence of childhood.
Me too! They're both classics for a reason.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I love to cook and I play bass guitar.
That's awesome! I love to cook too, but I'm not very good at it.
I'm sure you're better than you think!
I'm not sure about that, but I'm always willing to learn.
Well, if you ever want to cook together, I'm always up for it!
I'd love that!
Great! We can exchange recipes and talk about music.
Sounds like a plan!
